The morphological features of all prepared materials were investigated by taking SEMimages.
erences neither in particle size nor shape were observed with the increase of Eu
in synthesized compounds. The representative SEMimages of Rb
a,b. The ﬁgure demonstrates that powder consists of agglomerates, which are
formed fromsmaller crystallites with broad size range. The shape of these crystallites is mostly rod-like.
c depicts the SEMimage of the surface of Rb
surface is formed fromcrystallites of various sizes. These crystallites are well grown together and form
an even surface of the ceramic disk.
The IR spectra of undoped Rb
are shown in Figure S3. The given IR spectra contain several absorption bands in the
. The three sharp absorption bands in the range of 650–450 cm
bending vibrations. Strong absorption band at 900–700 cm
